## MutationInput type

All required fields and relational fields, exclude readonly fields

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MutationInput<Fields, WritableFields = Pick<Fields, WritableKeys<Fields>>> = {
    [Prop in keyof WritableFields as WritableFields[Prop] extends (...args: any) => any ? never : Prop]: WritableFields[Prop];
};
```
**References:** [WritableKeys](./data-schema-types.writablekeys.md)
